title: Chesapeake Bay: Volunteer
body: Volunteer       FindYourChesapeake is your best source for finding places and projects that suit your interests. Youâ€™ll find links to sites throughout the Chesapeake Bay watershed where your help is needed.  More than 160 sites across the watershed provide a great diversity of Chesapeake experiences. All of the museums, parks, wildlife refuges, water and land trails, and other places that make up the Network rely on volunteer help to maintain and restore the natural, cultural, and recreational resources in their care.
